topics.body:
I just noticed how the Lanterns from DC are arranged in this.

*ROY G BIV*

The Red, Orange and Yellow Lanterns are villains while the Blue, Indigo and Violet Lanterns are the somewhat heroes.
Green is placed in the middle for being the most stable and can go either way.
The further away it is from the middle, the more unstable the Lantern is.
